mapper.insert: insert into AC_ORDER_DETAIL (ID, OD_COMMODITY_ID, OD_ORDER_ID, OD_REMARKS, OD_CREATE_TIME, OD_COMMODITY_NUMBER, OD_DEVELOP_07, OD_DEVELOP_06, OD_DEVELOP_05, OD_DEVELOP_04, OD_DEVELOP_03, OD_DEVELOP_01, OD_DEVELOP_02) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{odCommodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{odOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{odRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{odCommodityNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{odDevelop07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odDevelop06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odDevelop05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odDevelop04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odDevelop03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odDevelop01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odDevelop02,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update AC_ORDER_DETAIL set OD_COMMODITY_ID = #{odCommodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OD_ORDER_ID = #{odOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OD_REMARKS = #{odRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_CREATE_TIME = #{odCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OD_COMMODITY_NUMBER = #{odCommodityNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OD_DEVELOP_07 = #{odDevelop07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_DEVELOP_06 = #{odDevelop06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_DEVELOP_05 = #{odDevelop05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_DEVELOP_04 = #{odDevelop04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_DEVELOP_03 = #{odDevelop03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_DEVELOP_01 = #{odDevelop01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OD_DEVELOP_02 = #{odDevelop02,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, OD_COMMODITY_ID, OD_ORDER_ID, OD_REMARKS, OD_CREATE_TIME, OD_COMMODITY_NUMBER, OD_DEVELOP_07, OD_DEVELOP_06, OD_DEVELOP_05, OD_DEVELOP_04, OD_DEVELOP_03, OD_DEVELOP_01, OD_DEVELOP_02 from AC_ORDER_DETAIL where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ID, OD_COMMODITY_ID, OD_ORDER_ID, OD_REMARKS, OD_CREATE_TIME, OD_COMMODITY_NUMBER, OD_DEVELOP_07, OD_DEVELOP_06, OD_DEVELOP_05, OD_DEVELOP_04, OD_DEVELOP_03, OD_DEVELOP_01, OD_DEVELOP_02 from AC_ORDER_DETAIL
